chatDisplayPane - Variable in class pack.ChatPanelGUI
 
ChatPanel - Class in pack
ChatPanel is the backend implementation of a ChatPanelGUI that holds a number of clients (ClientThreads) and all in all represents a single chat.
ChatPanel(String) - Constructor for class pack.ChatPanel
Calls ChatPanel(String,ArrayList(ClientThread)) with an empty list
ChatPanel(String, ArrayList<ClientThread>) - Constructor for class pack.ChatPanel
Creates a new ChatPanel that initiates a new ChatPanelGUI
chatPanel - Variable in class pack.ChatPanel
 
chatPanel - Variable in class pack.ChatPanelGUI
 
chatPanel - Variable in class pack.ClientThread
 
chatPanel - Variable in class pack.MainGUI
 
ChatPanelGUI - Class in pack
 
ChatPanelGUI(String, ChatPanel) - Constructor for class pack.ChatPanelGUI
Initializes a new chatpanelgui with an associated name and chatthread
ChatPanelGUI.OptionPaneEventHandler - Class in pack
OptionPanel Event-Handler that handles input from the OptionPane, that is, removing users/clients and closing down chats.
ChatPanelGUI.SendMessageEventHandler - Class in pack
EventHandler for the Send-button.
ChatPanelGUI.TextStyleEventHandler - Class in pack
ActionListener that handles the style formatting of the chat.
chats - Variable in class pack.MainGUI
 
chatSendButton - Variable in class pack.ChatPanelGUI
 
chatTypingPane - Variable in class pack.ChatPanelGUI
 
checkAndInsertTag(String, HTMLParser) - Method in class pack.ChatPanelGUI.TextStyleEventHandler
Utility method for checking a HTML-representation and inserting the appropiate tags for whichever style was selected for the highlighted text.
clients - Variable in class pack.ChatPanel
 
ClientThread - Class in pack
A clientthread is a thread that will initialize on a socket and listen for incoming messages.
ClientThread(Socket) - Constructor for class pack.ClientThread
Constructor for initial contact with client before validation
ClientThread(Socket, ChatPanel) - Constructor for class pack.ClientThread
 
colorButton - Variable in class pack.ChatPanelGUI
 
connectToHost(String, String) - Method in class pack.Main
Connects to the provided host and returns the connection
connectToUserWithRequest(Socket, String) - Method in class pack.Main
Same functionality as connectToHost except that this function takes a requestText to send with the connection, and waits for a response!
convertHTMLtoMessage(HTMLParser) - Method in class parsing.MessageParser
Converts a HTML-string to a Message (used when sending a message on the extracted HTML from the JTextArea) by parsing it!
createNewChat(Socket) - Method in class pack.Main
Starts a new chat window with the socket provided
CURRENT_CHAT_NAME - Static variable in class pack.Main
 
CURRENT_PORT - Static variable in class pack.Main
